Package fr.campus.loic.tictactoe.player

Class ArtificialPlayer

java.lang.Object
fr.campus.loic.tictactoe.player.Player
fr.campus.loic.tictactoe.player.ArtificialPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
RandomCoordinateCapable
public class ArtificialPlayer extends Player implements RandomCoordinateCapable
Represents an artificial (computer-controlled) player capable of generating random moves.

    • ArtificialPlayer

      public ArtificialPlayer(String representation, int number)
      Creates a new player with the given symbol and number.
      Parameters:
      representation - the symbol representing the player
      number - the player number (1 = red, 2 = green, others = yellow)

  • Method Details

    • randomCoordinatePlayed

      public int randomCoordinatePlayed(int size)
      Generates a random coordinate within the valid board range.
      Specified by:
      randomCoordinatePlayed in interface RandomCoordinateCapable
      Parameters:
      size - the board size (e.g., 3 for a 3×3 grid)
      Returns:
      a random integer between 0 (inclusive) and size (exclusive)
